statements: SELECT * FROM voting_data;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_id FROM voting_data;
SELECT * FROM voting_data WHERE voter_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM voting_data ORDER BY vote_timestamp DESC;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_id FROM voting_data WHERE vote_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY voter_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM voting_data ORDER BY vote_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT voter_id, COUNT(candidate_id) AS total_votes FROM voting_data GROUP BY voter_id HAVING COUNT(candidate_id) > 1
SELECT candidate_id, COUNT(voter_id) AS vote_count FROM voting_data GROUP BY candidate_id ORDER BY vote_count DESC
SELECT voter_id, candidate_id, vote_timestamp FROM voting_data WHERE voter_id = 12345 AND candidate_id = 67890
SELECT MAX(vote_timestamp) AS latest_vote_time FROM voting_data
SELECT * FROM voting_records;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_name FROM voting_records WHERE candidate_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM election_results ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, percentage_votes FROM election_results WHERE total_votes > 1000;
SELECT voter_id, vote_timestamp FROM voting_records WHERE vote_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM voting_records WHERE voter_id = 1;
SELECT candidate_name, total_votes FROM election_results WHERE percentage_votes > 50;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_name, vote_timestamp FROM voting_records ORDER BY voter_id DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, percentage_votes FROM election_results ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_name, vote_timestamp FROM voting_records WHERE vote_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY vote_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM voting_data;
SELECT candidate_name, votes_received FROM candidate_status WHERE votes_received > 100;
SELECT election_id, winner_name, total_votes FROM election_results ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT candidate_name FROM candidate_status WHERE candidate_id = 3;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_name, vote_timestamp FROM voting_data WHERE vote_timestamp >= '2021-10-01' AND vote_timestamp <= '2021-10-31';
SELECT * FROM voting_data WHERE voter_id = 1
SELECT candidate_name, votes_received FROM candidate_status ORDER BY votes_received DESC
SELECT winner_name, total_votes FROM election_results WHERE total_votes > 1000
SELECT * FROM voting_data WHERE vote_timestamp > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY vote_timestamp DESC
SELECT candidate_name, votes_received FROM candidate_status WHERE votes_received >= 500
SELECT * FROM VotingRecords;
SELECT voter_id, candidate_id FROM VotingRecords WHERE candidate_id = 1;
SELECT voter_name, voter_address FROM Voters ORDER BY voter_name DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM Candidates WHERE party_affiliation = 'Democratic';
SELECT * FROM AuditTrail ORDER BY audit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT voter_name, voter_address FROM Voters;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM Candidates WHERE party_affiliation = 'Democratic';
SELECT voter_name, COUNT(*) AS total_votes FROM Voters JOIN VotingRecords ON Voters.voter_id = VotingRecords.voter_id GROUP BY voter_name ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, COUNT(*) AS total_votes FROM Candidates JOIN VotingRecords ON Candidates.candidate_id = VotingRecords.candidate_id GROUP BY candidate_name ORDER BY total_votes ASC;
SELECT audit_timestamp, event_description FROM AuditTrail WHERE audit_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY audit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT voter_name, voted_candidate FROM voters WHERE voter_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM candidates WHERE candidate_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT candidate_id, total_votes FROM election_results ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT voter_name, voted_candidate FROM voters WHERE voted_candidate LIKE '%Doe%';
SELECT action, timestamp FROM audit_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM voters WHERE voter_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT voter_name, voted_candidate FROM voters WHERE voter_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT candidate_name, total_votes FROM candidates INNER JOIN election_results ON candidates.candidate_id = election_results.candidate_id;
SELECT voted_candidate, COUNT(*) as total_votes FROM voters GROUP BY voted_candidate;
SELECT voter_id, voter_name, action FROM voters JOIN audit_log ON voters.voter_name = audit_log.action;
